stateofthenation1: Ma, if it may please you to take a little of your overly occupied time, perhaps as I thinks, not waste it on nonsense, to preview my newly already completed manuscript, it might in regard to possibility and your high profile help me a lot in life as an aspiring writer. It's novel I hope without doubt, would change the perceptive of the common man on the government, and the government on the common man. It delves into our cultural entity and political institution. Quite alluring as I solemnly believes that it is on Wisdom disposition, and overtly compelling in standard, choice of words and characters. Ada Igbo bu eze, I only wish to apply for a publication assistance, you could even do it yourself or someone at your service. I'm willing to send it across if need be. All I want is for you to help me in realising a part of my dreams. I'm Ekene by name, 26yrs old, an indigene of Ebonyi state, but resides in Lagos. It's by that dream of which I saw afar, even when the cloud subjected me to surrender, that I out of my destitution, lingered on to persistence. If I fail, I fail because I did try to rise, and if I rise, I rise because I know my credibility and what I wanted with all embedded passion. Quitting is not an option, because it's not today, it might be tomorrow. @chimamanda_adichie @urielmusicstar @areafada1 @realangelaokorie @bankywellington
